<h3 id="X30337">X(30337) = ENDO-HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: ANTI-HUTSON INTOUCH AND SUBMEDIAL</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*(a^3+3*(b+c)*a^2-(b^2+22*b*c+c^2)*a-3*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c))  :  :
<p>
The homothetic center of these triangles is X(11479). X(30337) is their endo-homothetic center only when ABC is acute.</p>
<p>X(30337) lies on these lines:
{1,3}, {4,11379}, {8,30393}, {9,11519}, {10,12541}, {11,30315}, {12,30308}, {145,5223}, {200,3890}, {390,3062}, {392,4882}, {496,19875}, {936,3898}, {950,30326}, {1000,3632}, {1001,3680}, {1056,9589}, {1058,3679}, {1699,5261}, {1706,10179}, {2136,8580}, {2347,3731}, {3241,12526}, {3488,3633}, {3884,6765}, {3893,7308}, {3895,8583}, {4313,30304}, {4326,30318}, {4342,11522}, {4355,28194}, {4668,5722}, {4677,15170}, {4853,5260}, {4900,7160}, {5234,12629}, {5290,30305}, {5436,10912}, {5531,15558}, {5558,11034}, {5691,12575}, {5726,9614}, {5785,12536}, {5881,15172}, {5882,7992}, {5918,12128}, {7988,10588}, {7989,10591}, {8078,10968}, {8167,11530}, {8236,30330}, {8240,30363}, {8241,30371}, {8242,30395}, {9588,14986}, {9814,30332}, {10582,14923}, {10866,30291}, {11037,28228}, {11108,11525}, {11924,30394}, {12447,12632}, {12577,20070}, {12640,26105}, {12735,12767}, {13463,25525}, {16673,17451}, {30333,30396}, {30334,30397}, {30338,10655}, {30339,10656}</p>
<p>
X(30337) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 3339, 30343), (3339, 30343, 10980), (6767, 7982, 1)<br>
</p>
